name: dnd_updated
desc: Do not Disturb settings changed for the current user.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community Do not Disturb settings changed for the current user  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					dnd:read 				 The dnd_updated event is sent to the current user when their Do Not Disturb settings have changed. This event is not available to bot user subscriptions in the Events API.
